title: I PAID but no RP
body: I need help getting my money back I paid for 1975 RP and got nothing{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
So sometimes it just takes a hot sec to update, particularly if you make purchases out of business hours because of things like any extra checks your bank tries to do that won't process straight away, etc.

If it's been more than 24 hours and you've restarted your client at least once, then I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to track down the purchase and help you out.
